      • grabCard

        public abstract Card grabCard(int cardID)
                       throws NotCardException
        Each cell has some card on it, this method grab a card
        Parameters:
        cardID - ID of the card I wanna grab (ONLY FOR THOSE CELL THAT HAS MORE CARD ON IT) --Not CellAmmo
        Returns:
        the card on the cell
        Throws:
        NotCardException - If card has already taken or there not a card with the ID

      • grabCard

        public abstract Card grabCard(int cardID,
                              WeaponCard card)
                       throws NotCardException
        Each cell has some card on it, this method grab a card and replace that with another one
        Parameters:
        cardID - ID of the card I wanna grab (ONLY FOR THOSE CELL THAT HAS MORE CARD ON IT)
        card - The card to replace with
        Returns:
        the card on the cell
        Throws:
        NotCardException - If card has already taken or there not a card with the ID

      • setRoom

        protected void setRoom(Room room)
        Each cell has to have a room, this method set the appropriate room
        Parameters:
        room - room of this cell
        Throws:
        AlreadyRoomException - if a room was already set for this cell, it can't be modified!
